metadata.title: CVE-2020-10691 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An archive traversal flaw was found in all ansible-engine versions 2.9.x prior to 2.9.7, when running ansible-galaxy collection install. When extracting a collection .tar.gz file, the directory is created without sanitizing the filename. An attacker could take advantage to overwrite any file within the system.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-10691` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.9.7+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.7+dfsg-1').
